main_page.title: Settle in AustraliaSettle in Australia
main_page.summary: This page provides general information about helping new migrants and refugees settle in Australia. It highlights key settlement topics, language services, and tools available to support new arrivals. It also promotes the MyAus App as a multilingual resource for navigating life in Australia.

structured_data.overview: Australia has a long tradition of resettling migrants, refugees, and people in humanitarian need. With the right support, new arrivals can successfully contribute to Australian society.

key_settlement_topics.description: Information relevant to skilled migrants, family migrants, refugees, and humanitarian entrants to help them settle in Australia.

language_services.description: Language services help people with limited or no English access essential services and programs.

my_aus_app.description: The MyAus App provides useful information about settling in Australia.
features: Designed to help migrants and the broader community navigate systems and services in Australia

child_pages.title: Settle in AustraliaSettle in Australia
child_pages.summary: This page provides an overview of how migrants, refugees, and humanitarian entrants can be supported as they settle in Australia. It outlines key settlement topics, language services, and tools such as the MyAus App to help new arrivals navigate life in Australia.

overview.description: Australia has a long tradition of resettling migrants, refugees, and vulnerable people in humanitarian need. Refugees seeking protection often come from situations of extreme conflict and trauma. With proper support, migrants and refugees can contribute significantly to society.
overview.purpose: To highlight ways to help new arrivals build their lives in Australia.

key_settlement_topics.description: Relevant information for all new arrivals, including skilled migrants, family migrants, refugees, and humanitarian entrants, covering a range of topics aimed at helping them settle in Australia.

language_services.description: Language services are designed to ensure that people with limited or no English proficiency can access essential services and programs.

my_aus_app.description: Useful information about settling in Australia is available through the MyAus App.
features: Designed to assist migrants and the broader community to navigate systems and services in Australia

child_pages.title: Settle in AustraliaSettle in Australia
child_pages.summary: This page provides an overview of support services and resources available to help migrants, refugees, and humanitarian entrants settle in Australia. It highlights language services, key settlement topics, and the MyAus App as tools to assist new arrivals in navigating life in Australia.

structured_data.purpose: To provide information and resources to support migrants and refugees as they build their lives in Australia.
structured_data.overview: Australia has a long tradition of resettling migrants, refugees, and people in humanitarian need. With appropriate support, these individuals can contribute significantly to society.

key_settlement_topics.description: Information for new arrivals, including skilled migrants, family migrants, refugees, and humanitarian entrants, to assist with settlement in Australia.

language_services.description: Services designed to help individuals with limited or no English proficiency access essential programs and services.

my_aus_app.description: Provides useful information about settling in Australia.
features: Designed to help migrants and the broader community navigate Australian systems and services

structured_data.purpose: To provide information, resources, and support to help migrants, refugees, and humanitarian entrants build their lives in Australia.

overview.description: Australia has a long tradition of resettling migrants, refugees, and people in humanitarian need. Many refugees come from situations involving conflict and trauma. With appropriate support, new arrivals can successfully settle and contribute significantly to Australian society.

key_settlement_topics.description: Information relevant to skilled migrants, family migrants, refugees, and humanitarian entrants to help them settle in Australia.

language_services.description: Language services ensure people with limited or no English proficiency can access essential services and programs.

my_aus_app.description: A multilingual mobile app that provides useful information to assist migrants and the broader community in navigating Australian systems and services.
features: Supports understanding of essential services and settlement processes
